data.title: 2012 in film
authors: Contributors to The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
data.meta_description: Template:Year nav topic5 Template:Years in film The following tables list films released in 2012. Most notably, the two oldest surviving American film studios, Universal and Paramount both celebrated their centennial anniversaries, marking the first time that two major film studios celebrate 100...
data.meta_site_name: The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
